scripts.start: env REACT_DEBUGGER="$([ -d '/Applications/React Native Debugger.app' ] && echo "open 'rndebugger://set-debugger-loc?host=localhost&port=8081' --args")" npm run start
scripts.ios: cd ios && rm -rf build && cd .. && react-native run-ios --simulator="iPhone 7"
scripts.android: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android
